summary: This verification analyzes a comprehensive production-grade upgrade implementing role-based dashboard views, disease classification, 9-ward heatmap, priority scoring, alert history, EmailJS integration, and advanced visualizations. The diff shows substantial implementation of most requirements with high fidelity to specifications.

missing_requirements.reason: The EmailAlertService.ts file contains comments indicating EmailJS is NOT installed and is using mock implementation. Comments explicitly state 'EmailJS package is not installed' and provide installation instructions.

missing_requirements.requirement: 7-day moving average with history arrays maintaining last 7 readings
missing_requirements.reason: Backend implementation creates fixed-size arrays using Array.repeat but the updateHistory function shifts values incorrectly - it reads from history[i-1] which would lose the oldest value without proper rotation. The implementation doesn't properly maintain a circular buffer of exactly 7 historical values.

missing_requirements.requirement: Tab-based navigation for Government view with 4 specific tabs
missing_requirements.reason: DashboardPage.tsx imports Tabs components and declares activeTab state, but the diff is truncated before showing the actual tab implementation. Cannot verify the 4 tabs (Overview, Intervention Priority, Alert History, Analytics) are properly rendered.
